summary: This is an email chain from December 3, 2019, forwarding an online post from a user named 'Dollar Bill' (William Mersey) on the TNA review board. The post claims knowledge about Jeffrey Epstein's suicide. The email is shared between law enforcement personnel as a potential lead, noting Mersey's prior conviction for promoting prostitution.

persons.name: William Mersey
persons.role: Online poster claiming knowledge on Epstein suicide
persons.context: Referred to by his alias 'Dollar Bill'; he is mentioned as having been prosecuted for a felony promoting prostitution conspiracy and is the author of a TNA Board post alleging knowledge about Epstein's suicide.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: Suggested that the email sender forward the information about 'Dollar Bill's' post to the FBI recipient.

events.title: Email forwarding online post about Epstein suicide
events.description: An email is forwarded containing a post from 'Dollar Bill' (William Mersey) on the TNA review board claiming knowledge about Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.

keyFacts: An online poster using the alias 'Dollar Bill', identified as William Mersey, made claims on the TNA review board about having knowledge regarding Jeffrey Epstein's suicide.
William Mersey has a criminal history, having been prosecuted for a felony promoting prostitution conspiracy.
Law enforcement personnel are sharing this online post as a potential lead, though they express skepticism about its credibility.
